q: The great poet and dramatist ______ dead.
The king, with all his ministers, ______ present there.
Every man, woman, and child in the village ______ wounded.
Rice and curry ______ his favourite food.
He is one of the greatest leaders that ever ______.
A number of students ______ caught copying.
The boy and the girl ______ to the same college.
The orator and the statesman ______ arrived.
Many of the students ______ failed in the examination.
Most of the students ______ their time.
A large number of workers ______ struck work.
